headline: Chatterbox: Monday
text: Oh, Monday again. How was your weekend? More Far Cry 3 for me. I spent ages planning a subtle, stealthy raid on a pirate outpost and just as I was about to start, a pack of dingos ran into the enclosure  the pirates started throwing fire bombs, killing three of their own number in the process. I just walked in, switched the alarm off and finished the rest.
